website_summaries.verdict: Earns the top spot on our shortlist for exceptional comfort, quality construction, and attractive style.
pros: Sports a well-made hardwood  frame in attractive cappuccino color
Features thickly padded backrest and seat and a 29-inch seat height that accommodates most counters and tables
You get two for the price
cons: Assembly is somewhat difficult and the instructions are confusing

customer_reviews.title: *********DO NOT BUY*******
customer_reviews.text: ***BYER BEWARE. DO NOT BUY*** I purchased 4 of these barstools 6 months ago and the black paint is peeling off on 3 of the barstools. These rarely get used, we are meticulous in caring for our furniture and we don't have children in the home. I received the run around from the seller and manufacturer when I called to ask about their warranty. There is no warranty past 15 days. Neither of these companies will stand by their product and replace them.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Green

customer_reviews.title: Seats don't hold up to daily use.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these in May. It's November and they have been in daily use since arriving. The seats appear to be vinyl and they are cracking and breaking open around the front. At a minimum I am going to have to try and re-cover them to keep them in a presentable state. They would probably be ok as decoration for a bar or something you don't use very often. But they aren't up to daily use for any extended period of time. Other than the seat cushions disintegrating they have held up well. I wouldn't buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Broken back rest
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two chairs. I opened the first box and there is a crack in the back rest of the chair frame.
customer_reviews.author: Seth B.

customer_reviews.title: I purchased 6 of these stools and they are amazing..
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 6 of these stools and they are amazing...workmanship is good...these are sturdy stools. I can honestly say that family and friends were impressed with the quality of this stool...also comfortable...install instructions were excellent.
customer_reviews.author: pasqualina medure

customer_reviews.title: Love the stool - excellent quality - but lousy description
customer_reviews.text: Love the stool - excellent quality - but lousy description! I wanted to replace a stool that I have worn out. Measured the height as suggested in the description - floor to bottom of seat. Mine was 24" so that's what I ordered. Paid my son to put it together. But it's about 5" shorter and I can't use it! Floor to bottom of seat is under 20". So I'm out the cost of the chair, cost of getting it put together, and the cost of ordering a taller bar stool. $250. Not a pleasant experience.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Bonner

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful stools!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 4 of the cappuccino colored stools. My husband and son assembled them. It took 2 evenings but they are beautiful! The wood is a little darker than I thought it would be. I wanted it to match my cupboard wood but it's close enough that it looks nice. The chairs swivel nice and are very comfortable. The only thing I can say negative is that before ordering these you should carefully measure your width space. The seats on these stools are wide. My previous stools were more narrow. They fit ok but a tiny bit tight. Overall, they are gorgeous stools especially for the price! I would order again from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is horrible for a chair to happen and no way to ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 of these chairs last Christmas and one of them is has split in half under neath the seat area. The wood that holds the seat complete broke in half. This is horrible for a chair to happen and no way to repair it. I will never buy from this company again. I am sure the other 3 chairs will eventually break too.
customer_reviews.author: Bertha

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am happy!!! I purchased these Bar Stools for our entertainment room. They were quick and easy to assemble (did so by myself while watching Law&Order), and look great! I was concerned about some of the comments about heavier folks sitting in them - here is my opinion on that, My husband is a bigger guy (about 230lbs) and he is comfortable sitting on them. Again, very happy - just ordered the matching pub table.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy chairs, have lasted well this past year
customer_reviews.text: Have had these for almost a year, use them at our kitchen island - have held up well. Have stayed tight, seat cushion has stayed good too. One reviewer noted these have a slightly "distressed" look which is accurate, but not an issue for me - it's only the outside corners of the pieces, not noticeable unless you look for it. Someone else mentioned you see the bronze-colored screw heads after assembling them - that's true - again, not a problem for me. Some manufacturers of furniture have little plastic things you can put over the screw heads to hide them. You can see them on the picture if you look closely around the inside of the foot rest.
customer_reviews.author: Bernard Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase-happy :)
customer_reviews.text: The cherry color matches my custom kitchen cabinets perfectly. I would have loved leather, but for the price on these you cannot beat the craftsmanship, nail head trim and heaviness of the stools, very sturdy. They look way more expensive than they are, swivel easily, assemble is easy and they have a metal ring on the foot rest to keep from wearing the wood finish. We have a counter height bar, so we purchased the 29", they are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: it's me

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely LOVE this chair
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this chair. I am only 5 ft tall and my office desk was a little too high for me using a regular height chair. I ordered the counter stool and it is absolutely PERFECT. VERY well made and easy to put together. I will definitely be ordering the bar stools when I renovate my kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Beckman

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY BEAUTIFUL!! Love Amazon customer service
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 4 of the Boraam Kyto barstools. My husband was able to assemble them with relative ease in about an hour. A little disappointed after a few days, the screws provided for the backs were too long and split the wood in the first couple of days. Contacted Amazon and received replacement chairs within a couple of days. Screws provided with replacement chairs were still too long. Purchased shorter screws to use to assemble 2nd set. I was so IMPRESSED with Amazon's customer service. The ease of returning the defective chairs quick response from Amazon in delivering the replacement chairs. Thank you Amazon for your AMAZING CUSTOMER SERVICE!
customer_reviews.author: M. Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Just no.
customer_reviews.text: I am giving credit for the look, but the quality is garbage. We bought 6 to go around our island. The day after we had bought and assembled them, one cracked on the seat when my brother-in-law sat down. (He’s under 150 lbs). In addition, less than 2 months after purchase, the bottom leg broke off another. We spent between $400 and $500 and are highly disappointed in the product. They are very poorly and cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Cassye

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY - CANNOT BE ASSEMBLED - CANNOT TURN SWIVEL TO ATTACH SEAT TO BASE.
customer_reviews.text: Be Careful of the positive reviews. They ARE NOT about this specific model. Bought 3 of these. Tried to assemble 1 and it was NOT possible after 6 hours!!. The next to last step says to attach the assembled seat & back portion to the assembled leg stand portion by turning the swivel on the seat to align with holes on the leg portion. THAT IS NOT POSSIBLE BECAUSE THE SWIVEL IS SPRING LOADED AND CANNOT BE TURNED - SPRING KEEPS IT FROM TURNING AND STAYING SO THAT YOU CAN ATTACH WITH SCREWS!!!!!! HAD TO RETURN ALL 3.
customer_reviews.author: jimbo57

customer_reviews.title: I love these bar stool
customer_reviews.text: I love these bar stool, easy assembly, super solid heavy wood and very good looking furniture.... I was hesitant about buying online at first but I took the plunge and I'm glad that I did!
customer_reviews.author: Lupe Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Most of this type of furniture I've seen comes from China, and is just "okay." This chair is built in Vietnam and is 100% nicer than others I've seen. Packing was great, directions "very" clear, and the chair is great looking. Also, the company's service is "outstanding." I had ordered 4 chairs, and one had a broken lower ring. I called the company and had the new ring in less than a week. If you want bar stools, these are hard to beat.
customer_reviews.author: David C. Corbett

customer_reviews.title: Great Stools at half the price!
customer_reviews.text: These are some solid stools. I have to say, they were an absolute pain to put together, but they're VERY comfortable and rival the $200 furniture store stools in every way. These have nice large seats, and are very tall. So tall in fact that we failed to measure properly and get our legs a little squished under the counter...oh well. You don't feel any rocking, and nothing has broken on our three chairs in the few months we've owned them.
customer_reviews.author: Patsy L. Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Broken part,  no response in over 2 months
customer_reviews.text: I give this product a 1 star review because I still haven't been able to put it together. The part with the swivel plate came in broken. I contacted Boraam and they promptly responded wanting more info. I sent them the info back at the beginning of June, but as if yet have not received a reply or replacement part. I bought 2 of these stools, one was fine. I like it, but I can't say the same about this one because I don't know. I hope it'll be like the other one, IF I ever get a replacement part.
customer_reviews.author: tina evans dooley

customer_reviews.title: Comfort is lacking
customer_reviews.text: Despite what many reviewers have said, I find these stools to be barely comfortable. OK for about 15 minutes but after that they become very hard feeling. I wish I had bought just one to see what the comfort level was. As it is, I bought 4 and will have to live with them. They are very good looking, well made and look great around my dining table but very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: redhawks2

customer_reviews.title: Decent Chair
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in July 2019 and am writing this review in June 2020. This chair has held up well. As of the last few weeks, the seat is cracking and peeling off. Two years isn't that bad for a chair in this price range being used daily by persons over 250 pounds. The mechanical stuff is working fine, just the cosmetic of the seat tearing at this point. A good value for the money, overall.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Harrell

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality barstools!
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace three old counter height barstools and found these through browsing Amazon. After reading some of the reviews, I decided to order. These are very high quality for the price, beautiful finish, very comfortable, look way more expensive than they were. Some reviews have mentioned difficulty assembling - I had no issues, these were very easy to assemble, the first one took about 30 minutes, by the time I put together the third, It took about 15 minutes. These were packaged very well, had no issues with broken or missing parts - highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Dellamorte

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and style!
customer_reviews.text: These stools arrived two days ahead of the scheduled delivery date, which was perfect timing. The stools were very securely packaged. They are very attractive, sturdy, well built stools that provide comfortable seating. Assembly was not difficult for my husband, who is a carpenter. It took him one hour to assemble both. I gave 4 stars because many of the screws were stripped and others were too short, luckily my husband had the necessary screws.
customer_reviews.author: Di

customer_reviews.title: You have to screw in pretty much every piece of this
customer_reviews.text: You have to screw in pretty much every piece of this, but it wasn't too bad. The hardest part was screwing in the swivel part to the legs, because the hex-key provided was waaaay too big to use to fit in there. Unless you want to do a million quarter screws to get it in there, look for a smaller hex-key. Tip: Don't tighten the bottom legs until you finish attaching the swivel to the legs, otherwise it's a tight fit sliding it in. Despite my one complaint, the chairs look and feel great, don't wobble and the swivel action is smooth, so five stars it keeps!
customer_reviews.author: A. M. Wren

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous bar stools
customer_reviews.text: Last night while entertaining a group of people the leg on one of these stools broke off throwing my guest to the floor. Fortunately she was not injured, but I was horrified! The pair of chairs is going to the dump! After looking at the reviews, I see that this is a major problem with these stools. I would suggest that these chairs be taken off of Amazon Prime! We Prime customers are a rather loyal lot. These chairs are going to injure someone! I have learned a consumer lesson in this experience! I will read the negative reviews first before placing an Amazon order. Even though only 6% of people complained about the chairs, these chairs are dangerous!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look nice, seat is a bit hard.
customer_reviews.text: They were not hard to put together but they hardly had directions (see below for my recommendation). They look very nice. The seats are pretty hard so I'm hoping they will break in, I've only had them for a few weeks. They also have a hint of red on the distressed corners. I wasn't expecting that but it doesn't bother me. This was the easiest method for putting them together: Attach the legs to the footrest, then add the bottom part of the seat to the legs. Next attach the seat back to the top half of the seat, then put the two halves together.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs but may be a challenge to assemble
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are nice and sturdy. A much better replacement for the metal ones we had before that constantly had bolts falling out. I did my research on them since I was paying a hefty price to get four, and knew there had been some issues with holes lining up for assembly. Therefore, when my first one was assembled by myself and my 12 year old daughter flawlessly I was very pleased. However the next two had some issues with the holes lining up on the final step of connecting the base to the seat and we had to wait for daddy to finish them for us. He did and we really like the chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Clark

customer_reviews.title: These stools are absolutely beautiful. I just love them
customer_reviews.text: These stools are absolutely beautiful. I just love them. They're sturdy, well made and have the cherry color I just love. True to the picture shown as well. Stunning to say the least. They're heavy at 30# and glide well on the floor with the floor protectors. Super easy to put together, very little to do. Packaging was exceptional.... Thank you Boraam for a job well done, you have one very happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Therese M.

customer_reviews.title: The stools look great for the price
customer_reviews.text: The stools look great for the price! But I have bought four of them and two are great and were easy to put together & two the bolt holes were off and a pain to put together and three of the stools wobble, had to add some scratch pads to the legs of three stools to level them out. But they work and look great now! Just be prepaired to make some miner modifications if you buy these stools
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love the bar stools HOWEVER they were difficult to assemble ...
customer_reviews.text: love the bar stools HOWEVER they were difficult to assemble in my opinion and they had a HORRIBLE odor to them. Once we took the packaging off (after they were assembled) they smelled like dead fish!!! I tried spraying them with febreeze and nothing has helped. I'm hoping amazon will credit me back some money since I can't return them unless I completely disassemble all of them which would be a major pain in the ass!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Noell

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: This bar stool is attractive and seems to be made from quality components. The finish seems nice, typical of oriental pieces. It was simple to put together; just a matter of screwing in 28 bolts. The problem is that once you get it together, it is very uncomfortable. The back is too close to the round seat, and the seat itself is crowned at the center and slopes to the edges, so that no matter how you sit, you feel as though you are sliding off. Glad we bought just one as a test.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond J. Braguglia

customer_reviews.title: Love These Counter Stools
customer_reviews.text: Love the chairs. Beautiful beachy color. Sturdy construction. Well made product. Shipping was fast with Amazon Prime. Seats are comfortable. Perfect height for our custom bar counter tops. Assembly did take approximately 20 minutes per chair as there are several pieces to put together, mostly screws. Excellent prices, as I purchased three on sale. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love them but.....
customer_reviews.text: I *really* wanted to love these. They hit all the major points I wanted in my island stools...."leather" seats that I could wipe clean, foot rest bar, and a nice back with a pretty design. BUT the construction is poor...of the 3 stools I bought, only one had all 3 sets of holes aligned for attaching the backs to the seats, which makes the seat backs very wiggly. The paint is signicantly chipped and I've only had them 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah J. Levin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent service and furniture!
customer_reviews.text: I bought four of these bar stools and I love them. They were pretty easy to assemble, just needed a little help, although when I put together the second chair I found one of the legs set of screw holes was drilled in the wrong place. I call Boraam and they sent a new leg out right away, the service was fantastic. As you can see by the picture they are very nice!
customer_reviews.author: robin baker

customer_reviews.title: I would love to give these chairs 5 stars they are awesome
customer_reviews.text: I would love to give these chairs 5 stars they are awesome. The problem lies in the predrilled holes not lining up. I had to remove the threaded insert from the hole, drill a new hole and reinsert the threaded insert. Once doing that, it was very simple to assemble even for a 64 year old woman. The stools are very comfortable and swivel without noise The were worth the trouble of re-drilling the holes. I hate to return things if I don't have to.
customer_reviews.author: BeckyB23

customer_reviews.title: They look sturdy, however......THEY ARE NOT WHITE!!!
customer_reviews.text: A bit dissappointed with these chairs. Although they were fairly easy to assemble and look sturdy enough, I beleive they are innacurately advertised. The listings state these stools are a distressed white color. The fact is they are not! They are a pale yellow cream color that do not really go at all with my pure white kitchen cabinets, which was the whole reason why I ordered these. Time will tell how sturdy these actually are, but the yellow color is something I just can't seem to get used to. Too bad the seller has inaccurately described these. Have had several people over since I assembled them and all are in agreement these are not white.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: For the price; five stars. I ordered 6 of these, 2 had to be returned/exchanged due to broken or damaged parts; so 4 stars. Return was easy and I found 2 more online. These are good quality, real-ish wood (MDF), fake leather, made in China stools. Easy to assemble in about 15-20 minutes each; follow the directions (tighten stuff in the right order). If they wobble, switch 2 adjacent legs and that should fix the issue. I really like the look of these stools, stain quality is good. All bolts lined up flawlessly (over 150 bolts in 6 chairs). They are very comfortable and the perfect bar height. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice heavy well made stool but if you have mobility or stability issues please be warned that the seat has a 360 degree swivel so it may move when you're trying to sit in it. My mom bought this for the kitchen as she can no longer stand for long periods while cooking but she nearly fell because the seat wouldn't stay still while she tried to sit on it. Now it's mine. I'm short legged so can't sit on it either! Anyone need a quality never used stool???
customer_reviews.author: DANA A

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy stools but came with some minor flaws. Good price for what you get though.
customer_reviews.text: We ordered 2 of these. Stools are nice and sturdy. They are pretty new to us and don't get used a whole lot but they are comfortable to sit in. Like some of the other reviews, quality control should be increased. One leg had a long crack and I had to reorder. Of course they were unavailable so I ordered an open box one. Which worked out fine in the end, however a pain. The black vinyl and some of the wood had small knicks in it but I figured with swiveling, the stools will hit my top and get marks anyway. Good stools for the price and I would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Hound Mom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a small kitchen space
customer_reviews.text: I received these stools and could not be any happier with them! They look great and are quite comfortable. I had purchased the kitchen cart by the same company and these matched very nicely. The assembly took about 30 minutes for each one, the instructions were a bit easier to follow than the cart, however I would recommend checking out some of the other reviews posted especially the gentleman who recommended how to attach the cushion to the swivel, saved a ton of time and frustration so thanks to him for the trick! Otherwise, very nice and a great compliment to the cart!
customer_reviews.author: Mark G

customer_reviews.title: Unlevel legs!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my newly remodeled kitchen. They were not easy to put together, bolts hard to get to in spots, could only turn them 1/8 of a turn and it took forever to get them tightened. But that wasn’t the problem. Once they were assembled, the legs were unlevel and had a bad wobble. BOTH of them! And there is only one way to put them together so it wasn’t my fault. I screwed up and threw all packing material and boxes away so I can’t return them. I would not recommend this stool. Choose a different one!
customer_reviews.author: Gary F.

customer_reviews.title: Broke in less than 2 months
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had these stools for less than 2 months and today while sitting in one of them, a leg literally just BROKE OFF. About 4 inches from the bottom of the leg, it BROKE. And of course it’s too late to return them. My wife and I are elderly and do not abuse furniture. There is no way that the stool breaking is our fault. It’s the manufacturers of the product that is at fault.
customer_reviews.author: Gamalier Mora

customer_reviews.title: Had for 2 years and still holding up
customer_reviews.text: We have had these for about 2 years now. We bought 3 to go by the kitchen counter. They weren’t too difficult to put together but weren’t super easy either, but it’s still doable by one person. My husband just got a little frustrated having to do 3 in a row :) They clean easily when wiping them down and surprisingly have no scratches after all this time even with my wild 7 year old constantly in and out of them. Comfort is good to my liking. Decent back support. They are very nice bar stools and look great in our kitchen. Very happy with these. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Brad & Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Great counter height stools!
customer_reviews.text: I had two people putting together three of these counter stools and it was stressful. The end result made up for it though. They are really sturdy and not overly heavy. No issues with the snivel either. Over time I think the cushion will get more comfortable (it’s a little stiff out the box).
customer_reviews.author: Brittani

customer_reviews.title: AUGUSTA BLACK 29" - PERFECT !!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased an Augusta black 29 inch chair and absolutely love it. My husband put it together and it took approximately an hour and a half from the time he opened the box to the time he put the chair behind the bar. Swivels great. No chips. No crack He did run into a little difficulty so I got on line and looked at the reviews and one gentleman (Shane wrote a review on April 3, 2015) that really helped my husband. Thanks Shane. My husband build an outside bar in the lanai so the chair is perfect for him to sit on behind the bar.
customer_reviews.author: PAM

customer_reviews.title: 6 hour assembly!!
customer_reviews.text: They are very poorly designed as you cannot put them together using the instructions in the box. If you have enough patience and do not mind 1/8 turns on bolts you cannot position or reach with normal size hands you will be fine. The allen wrench provided does not fit in the space to attach the swivel to the chair so you have to be smart enough to create your own tightening mechanism. They look great but NOT WORTH THE EFFORT !!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Cromwell

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: Product shipped and received within four days of purchase. Well boxed and protected with no damage. All pieces accounted for. Assembly was straight forward; you don't have to be a mechanical engineer to assemble. DO NOT tighten any of the bolts (16) that attach the legs and chair base to their respective support structure until you get the entire assemble together. Makes it much easier to align the bolts and holes with a lot of slop. Had to file down the Teflon pad on the bottom of two of the legs to get the stool to sit firmly on the ground. Very pleased with results.
customer_reviews.author: be400cpt

customer_reviews.title: Great furniture
customer_reviews.text: I just finished assembling 2 of the 4 chairs that I ordered and I guess time will ultimately tell about the quality of this product but I have to say I am very impressed by what I have seen so far. These are actually better than I had expected. Very sturdy, heavy wood construction, well designed for durability, just great looking furniture. Assembly is very straightforward. The engineering is clever, the materials are first class. Great stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Bamavic

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly, sturdy and attractive
customer_reviews.text: Shipment was fast and everything came through unblemished. Very easy to assemble though I found my own hex wrenches better for assembly. They look very nice and match the bistro set I received from Amazon a couple of weeks ago. Both were manufactured in Viet Nam and are very good quality. The stools are comfortable but not lush hence my only giving them 4 stars in the comfort slot. Overall an excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Schuessler

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but firm!
customer_reviews.text: These bar stools are a great value for the money. They are made very well and exactly the look I wanted but have very firm seats and not comfortable for long term sitting. I'm only giving them 4 stars because after 30 minutes, you wanna get up and stand or move. Luckily, we have these in the game room by the pool table so we aren't usually sitting for long. I'll have to think of an alternative stool for when we want to watch sports and sit for a longer period of time
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia A Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Well made, handsome stools--a good buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my kitchen island and I think that they're an excellent buy for the price. They were well packed and delivered quickly. When I opened the boxes, I found the components to be milled and drilled correctly and the screws, washers, and allen wrench neatly packaged. The directions were simple and straightforward and I didn't have any trouble lining up the separate pieces and/or screwing in any of the screws. The assembled stools feel sturdy. I sat on them normally and I weigh about 200 pounds (90 kg). The seat pads are comfortable and the back rests provide good support. Overall, these are a very good buy and I wouldn't hesitate to recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE THESE -- GREAT PRICE - SOLID STURDY GORGEOUS
customer_reviews.text: WOW!!! We ordered FOUR of these and they are FABULOUS!!!! They are heavy, sturdy, and look super nice! They were fairly easy to assemble, and they came well packaged -- and arrived surprisingly undamaged. I'm telling you -- these are super nice -- I don't know if they are solid wood but they feel like it -- they are heavy not tippy, not flimsy or skimpy in any way. We bought the counter height size. LOVE THEM! Great price!
customer_reviews.author: Shamusgilmo

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, but cheap wood
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 of these stools. They look nice, are well designed, sturdy, and don’t tip over too easily for my kids (although they still have to be careful). They spin easily and without noise. The reason for only 2 stars is that one of the support pieces under one of the stools snapped within a couple months. The heaviest member of my family doesn’t even hit 175, and these stools have been primarily used for for 30 to 40 pound kids. There is no legitimate reason for wood to buckle like this. When I repaired it I was able to see inside the wood, it is cheap wood and broke at a huge knot.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Nice rustic stools
customer_reviews.text: The stools arrived quickly, easy enough for a child to assemble (seriously my pre-teen did, I went behind and tightened after). They are heavy and sturdy enough my kids haven’t tipped them over getting up or down, the seat is firm and comfortable (I may buy thin cushions to preserve the weaving). The seagrass does have a slight outdoorsy smell but I assume that will subside over time. Overall, I recommended.
customer_reviews.author: A. Dillinger

customer_reviews.title: Fabric is awful !
customer_reviews.text: Good barstool but terrible fabric . I have grandkids so I scotchgarded the heck out of these guys . The weave in the fabric is too lose for the scotchgard to do any good . We are careful but unless you don’t have children , don’t bother . Mine are just ruined . I’ve tried every spot cleaner there is . Money down the drain
customer_reviews.author: Mary Kinney-Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed - distressed and wrong color
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in color ! Was not white as stated.... more yellow. I do not like distressed furniture and was blind sighted to discover this. My husband great at assembling things but this was time consuming for several reasons. Too much trouble to try to return so keeping until I can find what I want...... then will replace. On the plus side: VERY STURDY. Too heavy for me to lift or maneuver but my husband loves this part.
customer_reviews.author: Penelope Richardson Dyer

customer_reviews.title: more pretty than functional
customer_reviews.text: It's not fun to put together. Tight spaces and Allen keys are never friends. It took me around 45 minutes to assemble. The stools are very pretty, exactly what I wanted but mine do not swivel with ease. I did notice one piece of wood cracked but I don't think it structuraly is going to be an issue. My stools will get very light use so I anticipate them to be around for a while. I scotchguarded mine and there was no discoloration with the nailhead design.
customer_reviews.author: KHarma54

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, rickety construction
customer_reviews.text: These chairs began falling apart a month after assembly. I’m not just talking screws that constantly need to be tightened. The major joints and connections are separating and starting to crack. Within two months, a 15 degree play developed in the level of the seat. Possibly most annoying, the tops of the seat back hit just an inch higher that the level of the counter top. So the top corners are already completely destroyed from smacking into the counter each time the seat is swiveled.
customer_reviews.author: A. I.

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive and functional.Good value, seem very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: These stools (we ordered 3) are very attractive and well built. Assembly was a little cumbersome, as all the parts did not line up perfectly, but with some patience and maneuvering were able to fully assemble 3 in about 2 hours. They really look and feel like more expensive stools. We only wish they had provided some sort of protector for the finish of the foot rests, which are natural wood and finish, and obviously will soon require refinishing.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. K

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Time
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these, and they do not hold an adult very well. Certainly not a grown man. They would be good for kids or tiny people but not adults. The back comes over the seat leaving very little room to sit. The package of screws was open and fell out inside the box. I sent them both back at the same time, but have only received a refund for one. Very frustrated with waiting for full refund before ordering something else.
customer_reviews.author: amazoncustomer2

customer_reviews.title: did not want to waste anymore time assembling and reassembling
customer_reviews.text: Had one bolt that wouldn't thread correctly, had spent 45min to assemble only to find out I had to breakdown and repackage because this was the only option available. Very first time Amazon customer service was a nightmare. Cancelled the replacement, did not want to waste anymore time assembling and reassembling. Other reviews had similar problems, its a shame really nice looking stools. Spent 10$ and recovered old ones.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful stools and wonderful customer service!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these stools! They are sturdy and well made!!! The only reason I’m returning them is because the distressed white stools are a little more on the cream side and my kitchen cabinets are VERY white. I’m ordering again but in a different color. Also, I emailed the seller about requesting a return and almost immediately labels were sent to me to initiate the return process. I highly recommend!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marcy S.

customer_reviews.title: Coastal Theme Bar Chairs
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 of these to go with our coastal theme for the island in our kitchen. You do have to assemble them and my husband spent some time doing so - the second one was much fast once he knew what he was doing!! They look great and are very comfortable to sit on and the grandkids like to spin 360 on them!! Very sturdy and seem to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: SavvvyShopper

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to assemble and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble. The only reason I gave it a 4 star is because the seat back is lower than I expected so doesn't provide a ton of back support. I'm very short and it goes up to my mid back. I wish the cappuccino colored seat/faux leather part wasn't twice the price of the black ones because those matched are kitchen chairs but I wasn't going to pay double the price just for the color.
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: Just great all around chairs
customer_reviews.text: Great and beautiful chairs! I wanted swivel x back chairs and these were just perfect. I purchased 5 of them and they are very sturdy. I do agree that I can see the whicker on the seats being an issue later on but I’m hoping that won’t be for another couple years! The seat is nice and wide so it fits all the tooshie sizes so yay for that! Beautiful color selection and great materials. A friend commented that she thought these came from a fancy furniture store :)
customer_reviews.author: Kem

customer_reviews.title: I love these stools but like all reviews one of the ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these stools but like all reviews one of the chairs was very hard to put together and holes did not line up well. With a few tools my husband got it done. I have mixed reviews on the seat cushion. It is very thick and feels like it is made well and sturdy but it is harder than I imagined it to be. My husband actually loves how firm they are so it really is just a matter of preference. I like more cushion. The stools are beautiful in our bar room and priced very well for the quality of them. That is coming from someone that researched barstools for months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big Thumbs Up
customer_reviews.text: These are AWESOME. Gorgeous color and design, incredibly sturdy, surprisingly comfortable. VERY VERY happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Terrible finish on the wood
customer_reviews.text: The stools are sturdy, the right size, they swivel easily, and look great at our bar. But the finish is terrible. I can scrape it off with a very light scrape of my fingernail. Every time it touches a hard surface, it chips. Since they swivel, every time they touch the granite bar top they get a ding. I'm keeping them because it is too much trouble to disassemble and repack and send back, and fortunately we like a 'distressed' look. My solution will be to intentionally distress them a little more and put a better top coat on them. But had I known they were like this I probably would not have purchased. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Returned - Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: This stool looks like it would be solid, however I never bothered to put it together. I ordered the white one and the paint on all of the edges ( chair back, legs, footrest and seat) appeared to have been sanded off in almost all areas leaving bare wood exposed. I would be embarrassed to have this in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: FCD

customer_reviews.title: value for the money spent
customer_reviews.text: I like the looks and ease of assembly. For the money asked for, I thought it was fair compared to box stores asking prices. What I did not like is, we ordered four chairs, two sets were an older date code and the other new were newer. The newer batch did not swivel freely as the older batch did. I almost wanted to bring them back for replacements and figured I would get the same so I kept what I have in hopes in time they will swivel freely as the other two, but that has not happened yet. I would have given five stars if it were not for that issue.
customer_reviews.author: John Keefe

customer_reviews.title: Safety is an issue with these stools
customer_reviews.text: Be CAREFUL when using. Originally I was very pleased with the appearance of this furniture and thought they were nice quality.This was defective merchandise after very little use the leg snapped and broke in half while sitting on the counter stool. The person using it is under 200 pounds and he went flying when it collapsed.Since it was beyond the 90 day period Amazon would not replace the defective product and sent me a link to contact the manufacturer. Since I have purchased 5 other stools I am worried somebody else will get hurt sitting on them.I will have to replace them all because I no longer trust the quality or safety of these stools!
customer_reviews.author: jayneen

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, well made, sturdy, beautiful, easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Love these counter Stools. They are actually made in Vietnam! Go figure. They are well made, very sturdy, easy to assemble, heavy construction, beautiful color and comfortable. I bought them for a kitchen renovation that will begin in a month. I already put the 4 stools together and they are really NICE! I went for the padded back and seat for a level of comfort. The color of both cushion and wood is what I wanted. The swivel mechanism is well made and strong as well. The swivel is smooth as ice and sturdy. No wobble at all. This review is written at the very beginning of using the stools.
customer_reviews.author: BettySue

customer_reviews.title: seat area ok for child not most adults though
customer_reviews.text: I bought four. I assembled one and will be returning the other three. tedious to put together as hole alignment is not 100% accurate. The seating area is small. I am 5’8” 165 lbs. comfy NOT!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Follow Instruction book! Let chairs air out.
customer_reviews.text: Nice chairs for the price. Just have to say though the cherry color was really not a cherry color but more walnut. Some boxes did not come wit instructions so watch video in the listing. However realized instruction book has better instructions. The chairs had an odor coming out of the box so recommend wiping them down prior to use and perhaps letting them air out in the garage prior to putting them in your home. Eventually the smell resolved. Similar chairs at Costco we’re about 2.5 times more! So great price for bonded leather chairs. Will see how long they will last.
customer_reviews.author: Damian Fuentes

customer_reviews.title: Defective unsafe leg.
customer_reviews.text: One leg broke because the wood is cross grain this is definitely a defect from the manufacturer and should be replaced. Nice looking stool but if you buy them use them right away to make sure they are safe.
customer_reviews.author: Danjo

customer_reviews.title: Construction Problems
customer_reviews.text: On two of the four stools I bought, a circular wooden piece actually split apart as I was assembling the stools. Rather than going through the hassle of return shipping and replacements, I put the pieces back together with metal brackets. It's not elegant, but it works. If I were doing it over again, I think I would pay the extra money for assembled stools from a local store.
customer_reviews.author: Bob in Oregon

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Modern Appeal
customer_reviews.text: We love these stools... Im good at building things so it wasnt much of a challenge however make sure you loosely start each screw and line everything up first otherwise if you tighten them one at a time the following holes will not line up correctly as you go to tighten the next screw. Other than that these are good quality and look great... the leather accents on the back panels really set them off. We ordered three for our kitchen bar and have gotten many compliments. They have a good quality swivel as well
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: These chairs are perfect for my new kitchen
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are perfect for my new kitchen! Sizing is confusing, but I took a chance and bought 3 counter height stools. The seat height is 25" exactly. My counter/island is 36" and these chairs fit perfectly. We used loctite during assembly--we use it on everything we assemble. After putting the first one together, the other two were very fast. It's been a couple months and have no issues. For the price these are a very nice quality. Large people will probably no be comfortable in them however.
customer_reviews.author: Cb

customer_reviews.title: Great value, and looks much better in person than the pictures
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace my old peeling bar stools. As far as ease of build goes, you could not get any more simpler. Great job. Comfort is great, and the looks are even better than the pictures. Do yourself a favor and save some money by buying the Amazon Warehouse one, with a damaged box. The box is actually fine, and the contents are packed really well.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought three of these in the counter height style. You do have to put them together but at this price they are well worth it. Only one problem. One of the holes for the screws was not drilled all the way through. This was not a big deal since I have a drill. At least the hole was in the correct place. It only took about an hour to do all three. Once you have them together they look way more expensive than they are. They are very sturdy and feel as if they should last quite a while. Only time will tell, but at this point I am extremely pleased.
customer_reviews.author: AZ Desert Rat

customer_reviews.title: Nice chairs!
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful! Very sturdy and heavy. Feel very comfortable and confident sitting on them. I did use Loc-tite on the bolts. Instructions were easy to understand. I would encourage that you finger tighten all the bolts for each step, then in the order you would wrench tighten the bolts, remove the bolt, add loc-tite and then wrench tighten the bolt. Don't over tighten! And alternate as you wrench tighten to keep the product aligned as you tighten. Both chairs are level and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: AHarms

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I was very leery of purchasing furniture online without seeing it in person. When I got the three I ordered shipped in I was very very happy with the quality, color and ease of assembly. They fit perfectly at my kitchen counter island. Make sure you measure the height needed because I almost ordered the taller ones without checking.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Other than broken piece, great chairs.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 one arrived broken. Getting the manufacturer to send a new piece was very difficult. They never answer their phone or return calls. I had to go to the website and email them. They sent a list of required info to return. They never acknowledged receipt of the info, just sent the part. Save your box until you’re sure the chair won’t break. You’ll need the info on the box to order new parts. Other than the broken piece the chairs are great, they look nice in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: A. Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Good chair, great customer support
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 chairs. Unfortunately, 2 of them had cracks in one or two of the slats that are part of the backrest. I contacted Boraam by phone. Boraam's CSR, Marie, was polite and responsive to my situation and I soon received the replacement backrests. I wasn't thrilled using an Allen wrench to attach the bolts needed to assemble the chairs because some of them are difficult to see or reach so it was difficult to line up the wrench with some of the bolt heads. Other than the assembly, however, I'm very happy with the chairs. They are handsome and very sturdy and I was especially impressed with Boraam's customer service and their willingness to stand behind their product.
customer_reviews.author: jsteu

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble and takes just about 30 mins to assemble one chair. We got two and use it regularly. One minor drawback is if while sitting on it if you lean back pushing the table or countertop in front of you, it can topple back. We got a scare a couple of times with our toddler trying to get down and to make space between the chair and countertop, he leaned back pushing the countertop in front and the chair almost toppled but, he managed to recover. Overall though, it's a very beautiful and comfortable chair.
customer_reviews.author: S P

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking good quality stools
customer_reviews.text: These were very close in color to the product photo so I was very pleased that they perfectly matched the decor of our newly renovated kitchen and dining room. They're very sturdy and look nice. They don't wobble or creak or twist; they're very solid. They're heavy but that's a good thing. The swiveling seats are smooth and the seat and backs are comfy (well comfy for a stool). I'm very pleased with these, especially with how solid they are.
customer_reviews.author: Unexploded Minds

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Parts, falling off from under the seat despite a light use. Unsafe
customer_reviews.text: The pre-assembled parts are poor quality. Despite a very light usage the embedded screw holder assembly from under the seat started falling off, not sure how and why. See attached pics. I can't even put the holder back, there is only a paper thin spacing and no room to fix it without damaging the chair. The chair has become quite unsafe, can't be even fixed. Money wasted. We bought three of these back in 2013, except for the leather started to crack (due to reasonable wear & tear) the parts were steady. But it appears the construction quality has taken nose dive recently. I would NOT recommend buying them.
customer_reviews.author: Shweta A

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: I've not had these chairs but a month and they're in my office, so propel aren't sitting on them but once a week. They seem to be great chairs so far. I can't speak for the leather cracking and what not because I don't put that much use to them. I guess time will tell. But so far I am very pleased and they look great. Easy to put together
customer_reviews.author: readerjjmac

customer_reviews.title: Broken product, poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: These chairs generally look nice and are comfortable to sit in. However, customer service has been unresponsive. One of the legs came with a noticeable fingerprint in the clear coating (about 3 inches of finger), one stool was missing a washer, and one stool had a leg which broke after about 2 weeks in a place that shouldn't have had much pressure on it, so it seems like it might have been broken from the factory and then repaired. I contacted Boraam directly about these items, sent photos and asked for replacement parts, and have not received any response (at the time of writing this review, it's been almost 2 months since I sent them an email).
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase!
customer_reviews.text: These bar stools are exactly as described. Very sturdy and have a quality look. It took my husband about 30 minutes to assemble each one with minimal trouble. No damage or missing parts. We’re using these at our counter height breakfast bar. Perfect fit. Definitely recommend for great price. Quality product!
customer_reviews.author: DLP

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit in our new home
customer_reviews.text: Our new build retirement home had a rather high counter top (48") on the peninsula separating the kitchen from the dining nook. We wanted to use it for casual seating, and these extra tall stools fit the bill perfectly. We bought four of them and couldn't be happier with them. They are well made, beautifully finished, went together easily, and are sturdy and stable. One nice touch is that the top of the foot ring is protected from wear by a steel strip. We have hardwood floors, so I replaced the plastic glides on the legs with felt pads. Now it's the grand kids favorite spot when they come to visit!
customer_reviews.author: RCM

customer_reviews.title: Just bought three and love them. Connecting the swivel to the base is ...
customer_reviews.text: Just bought three and love them. Connecting the swivel to the base is definitely a two person job since it involves swiveling the chair upside down - no easy feat alone. One of them came with an incorrectly machined part (holes were horizontal rather than vertical so they didn't line up) and Boraam email customer support was awesome and shipped me a new base at no charge. Can accommodate​ big and tall people without issue.
customer_reviews.author: James W. Martin III

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stool to use in my work area. Wanted the height and back support. Height is okay but couldn't get comfortable with the back support. Also what really drug down my star rating is the seat cushion material. It isn't very durable and is very thin. I grabbed it wrong and put a small hole in the seat cushion. Quit disappointed in the quality of the fabric used. Probably wouldn't buy it again. On a positive side I took the back off and found the seat to be comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Mr TV

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous chair
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful swivel chair with great looking leather and wood. I bought 7 of them and put them all Together myself. Out of all those chairs only one screw was unusable. Fabulous product. Easy to Put together and I am 73 year old lady!
customer_reviews.author: KATHLEEN EVANS

customer_reviews.title: Very good chair for a home bar
customer_reviews.text: Needed all black bar chairs and these fit the bill. Be sure the screws are tight as sometimes in the chairs while swiveling a lot they can loosen. But not enough to come loose. This didnt happen in all of the 4 chairs we have, I just noticed it in one. Wish the back was a little higher.
customer_reviews.author: L. Darden

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent manufacturing
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these items for my new apartment. When they arrived, we managed to assemble one with relative ease, but the other one had one leg that was not cut properly and would not fit together properly, and the product is not returnable. If you are looking for a product that is easy to assemble, I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Hailey

customer_reviews.title: looks great but,,poor swivel unit
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a stool the would be used for daily meals,,so it had to be a sturdy unit.The design and appearance caught my eye and met my criteria,,but the construction was not what I thought it would be. The wood used is quality and the finish is too but the hardware such as the swivel unit is not. The stool rocks as it swivels,, even though it is not supposed to. The swivel unit is flimsey and should be upgraded. The appearance is quality but the swivel is flimsey.
customer_reviews.author: MIKE

customer_reviews.title: Seating area too small
customer_reviews.text: For the price the quality of the materials is very good. However, once constructed the seating area is too small for the average adult. You end up sliding of the seat. Purchased three and sent two back. The one I kept I removed the back. Aside from the holes being visible for the attachment of the back it is very comfortable. Would suggest if this company makes the same stool without a back it could be a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, Solid Wood
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised at the quality of the product. It is solid wood. It took my husband 90 minutes to put first chair together, but 20 minutes on the second chair. It is a great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: di

customer_reviews.title: Nice Stool
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 4 stool for new kitchen island. They look good, are good quality for the price and comfortable to sit in. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: SEM

customer_reviews.title: Happy I made this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Had my eye on these for a while and ordered three when they went on sale. Very solid piece and it looks fabulous. The assembly is rather laborious but the instructions are clear. Once I completed the first one the other two were breeze. Can't say enough good things about these barstools. The design is unique. It has a swivel seat and you won't be tripping over the legs. Glad I got these.
customer_reviews.author: Irish in Oklahoma

product_meta.title: Boraam Augusta Bar Height Swivel Stool, 29-Inch, Cappuccino, 2-Pack
product_meta.description: Size:29-Inch, 2-Pack| Style:Augusta| Color:CappuccinoThe Augusta is the ultimate barstool. Simple in design and features this barstool will fit into any home. Reliable and durable this piece is sure to last. Available in three different finishes, the Augusta will be perfect in any living space. Recommended for residential use only. Note: Seat height is measurement from floor to base of seat, and does not include additional height for seat cushion.
feature_bullets: Ready to assemble; Backrest Height is 14 1/2-Inch; Seat Diameter is 16-Inch
360 degree steel ball bearing swivel plate
Slightly flared legs for stable level seating
Footrest constructed from one piece of solid wood providing strength and stability
Warranty and support only available for products purchased directly from authorized retailers. See website for details

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars4,565 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
